concept.title: Key
concept.shortdesc: A column heading of Key indicates that the column data represents a unique identifier for each data record (row).

conbody.p: Each value must be unique across the entire system. The value in this field corresponds to a value assigned to the Analytics s_campaign variable in your Web site’s JavaScript beacon (s_code.js). Data in this column might include ~autogen~ or any other unique tracking code.
